channel.title: ellysplate TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from ellysplate

item.title: 8 years ago I stopped eating meat & I’m on a mission to rediscover how magical plants are… come with me on my new series PURE PLANTS to find out the best way to replicate meat, without the shop bought meat alts! #meatalternative #veganfood #fyp
